source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT M.FileID,'dbo' SchemaName,M.FileName TableName,L.Date,L.TimePopulated,L.RowID FROM ExtractLog L INNER JOIN ExtractMaster M ON M.FileID=L.FileId WHERE   ISNULL(FlgPulled,0)=0 AND Date=CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND M.FileID IN(8,9,10,11,12,13,14,15,16,24) ORDER BY FileID ASC

parameters.Subject: Marico Datafactory Error
parameters.ErrorMessage: Eror in Type 1 Transfer log on to portal for more details
